price: ពួកគេ(គ្រូមន្តអាគម)បាននិយាយថាៈ ឱមូសា. តើអ្នក បោះ(ដំបងរបស់អ្នក)មុន ឬពួកយើងបោះមុន?
arabic: قَالُواْ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِمَّآ أَن تُلۡقِيَ وَإِمَّآ أَن نَّكُونَ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡمُلۡقِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: qālū yāmūsā immā an tul'qiya wa-immā an nakūna naḥnu al-mul'qīna
